summary: The customer is looking to purchase a mid-range phone from Contoso Wireless with good battery life and camera. The agent provided information about the Contoso Wireless Mid-Range Smartphone, which has a 5.7 inch full HD display, 12MP rear camera, 8MP front camera, 64GB of storage with expandable storage up to 256GB, water resistance, and an advanced security system. The phone retails for $499.99 USD and financing options are available.
